name: Stickman Mafia: Street Wars
description:
Experience the world of one of your favorite fighting action games but with stickman as main hero! Advanced physics and immersive graphics have brought this experience to a whole new level for players!

The adventures of stickman hero with great fighting combat skills has just begun. Only the winning stickman can rule the streets in this action packed free online action game. This game has everything you want in top street fight gameplay with a fun twist to it.
As a top stickman figure of your team, win each challenge using fast action from your opponents and own the streets! As a skilled stickman fighter, bring order back on streets in the final fight. Bring out all your fighter skills to win this combat against enemy troops and become true protector of civilians.

▼ FEATURES:
◆ Free to play, play anywhere
◆ Interesting challenges
◆ Excellent sound
◆ Play and race top with all players around the world
◆ Easy to control
◆ Use acceleration sensor and gyroscope to control. Make the game look real and very interesting
◆ Control music volume, sound easily
◆ 2 World 30 Levels. Help you spoiled for experience
◆ Upgrade many different weapons

Download ""STICKMAN MAFIA : PARTY STREET WARS"" for free and share your relaxing moment with friends now!
